attributes.action: ensure that local authorities stagger term times to help with holiday arrangements
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the sales and marketing director of Center Parcs openly admitting that they raise prices by >300% of the 1 week of half term, the government is urged to stagger term times and half term times.

This simple move will enable families to enjoy holidays at closer to normal rates and end the monopoly that airlines, holiday companies and other leisure firms have on the pockets of parents of children.

It will also benefit commerce where there is a rush to book half terms, resulting in staffing issues.

This is a simple move which at worse would lead to non-even terms, but enable families to invest more time (and money) on their children.
